page.title: 09Clubs in Honington
page.content:
I go to Brownies it is a very good club you wear a brown uniform with a brown belt and a brown hat. Guides is the same but you have to be ten when you start Guides.You wear a blue skirt and a blue shirt. Cubs is a boys' club. Both types of organisation are run at the camp, and are well-attended.
In the village itself no specific childrens' clubs exist, though Deaconess Fogden has begun a regular Wednesday Club for schoolchildren after school weekly. A youth club has existed in Sapiston Village Hall, the only other public building for recreational use. The SHA(School Holidays Association) runs a scheme for part of the Summer Holiday.
